item.description:
It is time again for me to plan this meetup that nobody ever attends.

Are we not baseball fans? (Are we not BBQ fans?)

Remember that Cape Cod Baseball League game where you saw Jason Varitek play for the Hyannis Harbor Hawks? (CCBL Amumni)

How about the multi-hit game Kevin Youkilis had for the Bourne Braves?

Did not see those games? Then get on the Natives bus as we head to the Cape to watch future MLB players play in the Cape Cod Baseball League.

Players will be signing autographs!

Your Falmouth Commodores vs. Yarmouth-Dennis Red Sox.

June 30 @ noon:

  • We assemble at a central gathering point TBD.
  • We jump onto the Natives bus.
  • Since I am a native Cape Codder, I have a tunnel pass, and weekend traffic is not an issue. (In the tunnel, there are potentially multiple stops at pubs before you cross the canal)
  • Depending on how many souls make this trip, we will either BBQ at my Mothers house or at the Courtyard.
  • Game starts at 5:30pm - We will be there early for autographs.
  • Home ~10pm.
item.how_to_find_us: We go as one, return as many.
item.name: Watch the Red Sox play a game on Cape Cod!
